page.title: 07VILLAGE SURVEY - MUSIC
page.content: {MUSIC Comments on modern music by people up to 18 were,that modern music is a good use of modern technology and that it is good for a laugh.Others think that it is great and fantastic.People in Alne in the age of 19-50 think that most modern music is not bad,but some think it is boring and noisy.People aged 50-65 think that modern music is a cacophony and brain damaging,others think it is much too noisy. People over 65+ think that modern music is very loud and that they can't hear the word's very well. Some people say it is enjoyable.Some think it is boring and it has not got the melody like some music and it is too way out. People up to 18 years, liked classical and modern the most.People aged 19- 50 also, liked classical the most.People aged 50-65 liked country + western
